skills.name: Carry out two transformations on an object, where at least one transformation is a dilation (US)
Know how an ordered pair will change following two transformations, where at least one is a dilation from the origin (US)

explanations.A: When reflected P will end up at (-3, 1). When dilated the point will become (-6, 2) as the distance from the centre is doubled.
explanations.B: I think you reflected in the 洧논 axis rather than the y axis.
explanations.C: I think when you reflected you forgot to 'flip' the shape over. Remember the distance from the mirror line is the same for the object and image.
explanations.D: Almost, but remember the whole of the coordinate is affected by the dilation, not just the 洧논 coordinate.
